::Hakibuscon::

      Hakibuscon's world suddenly changes.  It was weird.  =
He could see a bright light. 

      "Take me there now!!!  I want to go th=
ere!!" He screamed in his mind.  There was no doubt about it, this was the =
Matrix.

     Then, the Matrix spoke to him.

     "I can't allow you to de=
part....You play a vital role in the war, go back, and carry out destiny," =
It said.

       After that, the Matrix disappeared, and Hakibuscon was onc=
e again back in the real world.  He couldn't last any longer, and he closed=
 his eyes.

     His spark then began to float out of his chest, and went z=
ooming around the area.  It kept going, and going.

        Later on, Haki'=
s spark came across a dead bot.  The spark entered the bot's body, and eras=
ed all memories and blablabla.  

     Hakibuscon woke up.

     He looked =
around, this wasn't where he was before.  He looked down, and screamed.

  =
    "AAAAAHHHHH!!!!!!!!  This isn't my body!!!!!  This is a female's body!!=
!!!  Man, I'm stuck in here!!!" He said.

     He then calmed down, and lau=
ghed a bit.

     He transformed into beast mode.

    Hmmm.....A snake....=
..Interesting....But still not as interesting as his chameleon!!

   He sli=
thered off, in hope of finding someone who could help him.
